news.title: Talk of regime change resonates with Iranians fleeing across border
news.summary: A steady stream of Iranians are crossing into Armenia by foot, laden with luggage and pets.

news.title: Israel says it struck Tehran's Evin prison and Fordo access routes
news.summary: Iran's judiciary says the attack damaged parts of Evin, a notorious facility which holds many political prisoners.

news.title: What is the Strait of Hormuz and why does it matter?
news.summary: Iran's threat to block the world's most vital oil transit point has raised fears of major global economic consequences.

news.title: What we know about US strikes on three Iranian nuclear sites
news.summary: The sites targeted include a uranium enrichment facility at Fordo.

news.title: RAF flight evacuates British nationals from Israel
news.summary: Foreign Secretary David Lammy says 63 British nationals were evacuated by the RAF from Tel Aviv.

news.title: Palestine Action to be banned under anti-terror law, home secretary confirms
news.summary: It comes after what she called a "disgraceful attack" on an RAF base and as a protest took place in central London.

news.title: National inquiry announced after NHS maternity failings
news.summary: It will target the worst-performing trusts in England - and report back by the end of the year.

news.title: 'Our sister died of cancer because of our mum's conspiracy theories'
news.summary: Paloma Shemirani’s brothers say she refused chemotherapy because of their mother’s beliefs.

news.title: Could this be the most significant Nato summit since the Cold War?
news.summary: Europe braces for Trump's arrival at the Nato summit with difficult questions over Iran and defence, following the 5% defence spending target he's demanded of allies

news.title: Heatwave over - but temperatures set to soar again in parts of UK
news.summary: After last week's heatwave, temperatures have dropped a bit but the heat is likely to start to build again by the end of the week.
